name: mysite
description: Conversion-focused service studio website built as a static multi-page site for fast launch on Cloudflare Pages.

scripts.check:syntax: for f in $(find src/js -type f -name '*.js' | sort); do node --check "$f"; done && node --check scripts/*.cjs
scripts.svgo: if command -v svgo >/dev/null 2>&1; then svgo --folder src/assets --recursive --multipass; else echo 'svgo not installed. Install svgo (npm i -D svgo) and run npm run svgo.'; fi
scripts.dev: npm run build && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory dist
